doc.title: Table Grid Box

value.content: The Table Grid Box is a block level box which contains all of the table internal boxes, excluding the caption. The box which includes the caption is referred to as the Table Wrapper Box.

doc.summary: The Table Grid Box is a block level box which contains all of the table internal boxes, excluding the caption. The box which includes the caption is referred to as the Table Wrapper Box.
